title: KA: Made by someone who has never played KA

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Play cards to defeat your opponents.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, draw 5 cards. You can not have 2 of the same card in your starting hand.
- You have 2 health. Any action that would kill you (besides execution) makes you lose 1 health.
- You can play up to 2 cards per night.
- At the start of the night, draw a card.
- Once per game, you can draw 2 cards of your choice at night.

fields.name: The cards are:
fields.value:
- Attack! - Deal a powerful attack to a player.
- Block! - Give yourself powerful defense at night.
- Heal! - Give yourself 1 HP (can only get 2 per game).
- Investigate! - Find out someone's exact role.
- Frenzy! - Deal a basic attack to your target and all who visit them.
- Persuasion! - Add a vote to a player during the day. This vote can not be changed. This vote will be attributed to "a card." This card can only be used during the day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 442
*Note- This is not very accurate to actual KA.*
